document.query: CREATE TABLE `device` ( `id` bigint(20) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `device_ref` varchar(255) CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL, `name` varchar(255) CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL, `data` varchar(255) CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_unicode_ci NOT NULL, `status` tinyint(1) NOT NULL, `shop_id` bigint(20) NOT NULL, `disabled` tinyint(1) NOT NULL, `created_at` datetime NOT NULL, `updated_at` datetime NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1;
